analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt2.investInternal (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#444-527):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#456-465)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#470-474)
	- updateInheritedEarlyParticipantWhitelist(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#490-492)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#505-509)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#511-512)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#509-511)

CrowdsaleExt2.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#805-810) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#808)

MintedTokenCappedCrowdsaleExt.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(salespool,receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol)

CrowdsaleExt2.claimTokens.token (local variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#806) shadows:
	- CrowdsaleExt2.token (state variable @ /unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#295)

	External calls:

	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#470-474)

Reentrancy in MintedTokenCappedCrowdsaleExt.setMaximumSellableTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#904-909):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(! lastTierCntrct.finalized()) (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol)

CrowdsaleExt2.getState (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#776-795) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#783-793)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/12/0xdc12a8e62a778d0732e3f4b522a733504ee2d369.sol#781-793)
